ingredients.name: wheat
ingredients.desc: cereal grain used as a staple food

ingredients.name: oats
ingredients.notes: risk of contamination from processing. Make sure they are Gluten-Free certified otherwise

ingredients.name: soy sauce
ingredients.desc: liquid condiment made from fermented soybeans
ingredients.notes: Wheat is used in the brewing process

ingredients.name: brown rice syrup
ingredients.notes: barley may be used in processesing

ingredients.name: annatto
ingredients.desc: used as condiment and food coloring

ingredients.name: buckwheat
ingredients.notes: considered safe but check if it is mixed with any wheat ingredients

ingredients.name: carob
ingredients.desc: legume sometimes used to replace chocolate

ingredients.name: glutinous rice
ingredients.notes: it is called glutinous for being sticky not for containing gluten

ingredients.name: pea flour
ingredients.desc: flour made from roased yellow field peas
ingredients.notes: considered safe but check if it is mixed with any wheat ingredients

ingredients.name: potato flour
ingredients.notes: considered safe but check if it is mixed with any wheat ingredients

ingredients.name: potato starch
ingredients.notes: considered safe but check if it is mixed with any wheat ingredients

ingredients.name: chickpea flour
ingredients.notes: considered safe but check if it is mixed with any wheat ingredients

ingredients.name: quinoa
ingredients.notes: considered safe but check if it is mixed with any wheat ingredients

ingredients.name: xanthan gum
ingredients.desc: food additive used as a thickener and stabilizer
